name: Gdraw
short_description: Gdraw is an genome visualization tool, including a GUI application and a Perl library. The GUI application creates the drawing interactively. It can also create the drawing by import annotated sequence files (such as Genbank, EMBL). Its backend library can be used in user-written perl scripts to create highly customized drawings.
summary: An app and a Perl library  for genome feature drawing
